title: Mayo College Musuem is a part of the renowned Mayo College of Ajmer
review: Mayo College Musuem is a part of the renowned Mayo College of Ajmer. The illustrious museum may be one of a kind museum in India. The museum is in possession of a priceless collection of antiques and armory. The museum also has a vast collection of artifact, old paintings, sculptures, photographs, coins pertaining to various areas of learning and knowledge. The Mayo College Museum is housed at the Jhalawar house and spreads over 18 rooms making it one of the best museums that any school can have in the world.

title: Rocking Museum
review: The museum is housed in Jhalawar House contains many antiques and armoury section.Made of white marble,the building displays a classic symbol of Indo-Saracenic archtiecture.

title: Mayo College museum
review: Mayo College Museum is Mayo College in Ajmer this Museum has good collection nice place to learn knowledge.

title: Great collection
review: Mayo College Museum is  one of the most famous Museum of Ajmer. Wonderful place for visit. My experience was good.

title: One of the essential objectives of the visit to Ajmer
review: To visit this museum and actually see this college built in the time for training the top representatives of Indian society, including the offsprings of the ruling families, was one of the essential purposes of my visit to Ajmer. This is an elite school. Its first pupil appeared in the 19th century, and crown Prince rided to his class  on an elephant! The college is a rich like only a few others, even the famous Eton in England; in addition to as many as 12 buildings and extensive library, there is even a golf course and cricket one, courts for tennis, squash, riding stables, areas for equestrian dressage and polo, a stadium matching the standards of the international Association of athletics federations (that is with a  400m athletic and 110m hurdle race  track, boxing rings, swimming pools and much more. The museum of the college fits into the picture, although it is not surprising, because of its rich funds. Moreover, it is the richest museum in the world, owned by some college. It even has a large collection of painting, sculpture, numismatics, decent section of natural history, in addition to zoology and botany sections.

title: Great experience...
review: It is one of the best museum in city. Many things are here which relates to our history. Collection of old paintings are just great. Lots of things of ancient time.

title: Impressive! Must see in Ajmer
review: The school buildings and grounds are impressive, including a golf course, cricket court and racing track. The architecture resembles Oxford or Cambridge, rather than its Muslim Indian surroundings - what a contrast! Definitely worth a detour, and probably the most interesting place to see in Ajmer

title: British time college museum.
review: Its a British time college museum which reminds you about the level of education and academician of that time.

title: school museum
review: It a school museum. It is unique museum .All item in it was donated by old boys, parents and other well wishers. spread over 18 room.

title: Historical visit
review: The musuem reminds you of the british era.The architecture is truly impressive and a good musuem to spend your time.

title: For History Lovers
review: Mayo College Museum is a must visit for the history lovers as the place has some nice collections of the past

title: lack of responsibility
review: we have arranged a trip in December and decided to go at this museum and for the avoidance of wastage of time we have make a communication with them in advance and told them about our visit there & they grant the permission to visit there. but at the day we visit their what we found museum is closed and we tried a lot to communicate with them they didn't response anything it such a humiliating thing for us to return back our trip group without get them watch out anything there. such a irresponsible staff.

title: Awesome !!! Great place to visit !
review: Visited with family , mr Ashok gave great tour of the museum , never knew that so much of history and things to see will be there ! They have variety of museum in one plus they have small zoo, lovely horse, ostrich etc

title: VERY NICE
review: Mayo college building itself is so appealing that you want to see it properly. The museum is well maintained and has kept alot of  history intact.

title: Amazing wow beautiful the best
review: The museum is so well maintained by the school authority.  It is a prestigious and a beautiful school itself.

title: Good
review: Great place for History Lovers. The Mayo College museum is located inside the  Mayo College school in Ajmer.

title: Surprise package- relics of colonial India!!
review: The Mayo College itself is a breath-taking beautiful structure, the main complex made out of unpolished carved marble, very beautiful, very proportionate, standing out in its pristine glory! The museum is a great way to see this fantastic residential school built in the 2nd half of 19th century during colonial times so that the princes of Rajasthan could get premium education! The school is popular with the rich and elite even today and ranks as one of the top schools of India. The school boasts of a a beautiful assembly/congregation room matching the very best of the ancient Oxford colleges.

title: This is an exclusive museum of collections from Old Boys and maintained by the students
review: Rare artefacts, artillery, items of warfare, very old items used by the erstwhile Maharajas, their hunts and many more.  Closed on Wednesday.

title: Quite a place..good stuff inside.
review: We heard of it from a friend, and requested the admin of the College to allow us to check it out, and they agreed. It's a bit small, but it has quite a lot of stuff to marvel at...the history of the college and the various illustrious alumni details etc are available...Worth a visit for sure.

title: great collections
review: we often visit this museum due to our son studies in mayo collage and we found best collections of old paintings here.

title: Very interesting.... worth a visit as its inside Mayo College
review: EXCELLENT MUSEUM, defiantly worth a visit

title: Mayo College (A childhood dream)
review: Even Before you enter Museum Area, you would be in awe of place. Students here are sure to feel royal treatment in their daily learning. Its like attending school in a palace. As far as Museum is concerned it has a good collection of hunted animals, armours etc. sure to have a knowledgable trip.

title: it is near to My Inlaws House
review: Its good one, although you guys might be knowing that this college is famous for its celebrity childrens as student. Although College is one of the top college it also most expensive college in and around entire rajasthan.

title: The best museum within a school
review: The Mayo College museum is located inside the prestigious Mayo College school in Ajmer.

title: Huge Antique Collection
review: This Museum is situated inside the Mayo college. We visit museum in afternoon on 24 Jan 2015. Mr A.K satarwala was very co-operated he is a caretaker of the museum. He show us all the stuff with interest and passion. We spent 2 hours in the museum. My son was very much exited during our visit to museum. Highly Recommended.

title: Awesome
review: Mayo college as it is a beautiful school spread over 300 acres. The museum though is a small one but has some excellent collection of coins, statues and other artifacts. The good part is that all the items have been donated by old students and welwishers.

title: Huge number of exhibits
review: An extensive collection of artifacts that go well beyond the history and culture of Mayo College itself. There is an interesting collection of antique weapons and guns from earlier wars. Well worth a visit if you are in the area. Please Note: Photography is not permitted inside the museum.

title: Good
review: If you are in Ajmer, the school itself is a good vist. Regal and historic. Museum has a good collection.
